txt.en: 'Let us see which, if any, foremen had a worker accident yesterday.'
You need to return to Othax at Rhakatâb tomorrow to find out if you made the correct choice.
Wait to see if you have won.
It is a new day. Make your way to Othax in Rakhatâb to see if you were correct that the safety foreman's workers would have an accident.
Choose the correct foreman
You chose wisely
Choose the wrong foreman
Provide your wager to Othax to enter the daily Dead Pool.
You chose poorly
Check if you won
Give a <rgb=#00FF00>Bag of Silver Coins</rgb> to Othax to place your wager
You chose poorly
'All right, I will mark this down. Come back tomorrow to see if you won.'
You should go see if you won the pool
You chose the safety foreman as the foreman that will have a work incident befall his workers.
Visit Othax after 24 hours expire

'If you submit this choice, you will bet that the safety foreman's charges will have an accident today. Are you really certain about this? There is almost never a day without an incident. It is highly unlikely that the safety foreman will not have an incident.'

The man shrugs.

'Your prerogative. Come back tomorrow to see if you were right.'
Othax checks his notes
Speak with Othax at Rakhatâb
Dead Pool - Safety Foreman
